CodeBlockMethod.Name: BackHome
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local back = 0 if(self.Entity.Common.is_left) then back = -57 else back = 32 end self.Entity.MovementComponent:SetWorldPosition(Vector2(back,9))

CodeBlockMethod.Name: skill_c
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.casting or (self.Entity.RigidbodyComponent:IsOnGround() == false)) then return end self.casting = true self:casting_bar() local f = function() self:BackHome() self.Entity.Common:canmove() self.casting = false self:casting_bar_remove() self:c_cool() self:C_coolTimer() end self.timer = _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(f,5) self.Entity.Common:unmove()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: z_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.z_able = false local a = function() self.z_able = true end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,self.z_cooltime)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: x_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.x_able = false local a = function() self.x_able = true end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,self.x_cooltime)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: c_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.c_able = false local a = function() self.c_able = true end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,self.c_cooltime)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Z_coolTimer
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.Zcool_save = self.z_cooltime -- Z 쿨타임을 저장 local Z = function() self.Zcool_save = self.Zcool_save - 1.0 self.Skill1_cool.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Zcool_save) self.Skill1_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Zcool_save) if(self.Zcool_save < 0.1)then _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.Ztimer) self.Skill1_cool.TextComponent.Text = " " self.Skill1_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = " " end end
self.Ztimer = _TimerService:SetTimerRepeat(Z,1.0)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: X_coolTimer
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.Xcool_save = self.x_cooltime -- X 쿨타임을 저장 local X = function() self.Xcool_save = self.Xcool_save - 1.0 self.Skill2_cool.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Xcool_save) self.Skill2_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Xcool_save) if(self.Xcool_save < 0.1)then _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.Xtimer) self.Skill2_cool.TextComponent.Text = " " self.Skill2_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = " " end end
self.Xtimer = _TimerService:SetTimerRepeat(X,1.0)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: C_coolTimer
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.Ccool_save = self.c_cooltime -- C 쿨타임을 저장 local C = function() self.Ccool_save = self.Ccool_save - 1.0 self.Skill3_cool.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Ccool_save) self.Skill3_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d",self.Ccool_save) if(self.Ccool_save < 0.1)then _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.Ctimer) self.Skill3_cool.TextComponent.Text = " " self.Skill3_cool_mobile.TextComponent.Text = " " end end
self.Ctimer = _TimerService:SetTimerRepeat(C,1.0)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: skill_v
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.Entity.Common.fever = true local parent = self.Entity local Eff = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://1e9e9224-bb6f-4859-837a-a8186ec66888","FeverEff",Vector3.zero,parent) local a = function() self.Entity.Common.fever = false self.Entity.FeverComponent.fever_able = false self.Entity.FeverComponent.dead_num = 0 Eff:Destroy() self.Entity.FeverComponent:feverUI_End() end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(a,10)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: betray
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity.Common.is_left) then self.Entity.Common.is_left = false else self.Entity.Common.is_left = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if(key == KeyboardKey.Z)then if(self.casting or self.lv < 1 or self.z_able == false) then return end self:z_cool() self:skill_z() self:Z_coolTimer() end if(key == KeyboardKey.X)then if(self.casting or self.lv < 2 or self.x_able == false) then return end self:x_cool() self:skill_x() self:X_coolTimer() end if(key == KeyboardKey.C)then if(self.casting or self.lv < 3 or self.c_able == false) then return end self:skill_c() end if(key == KeyboardKey.V and self.Entity.FeverComponent.fever_able and self.casting == false) then self:skill_v() self.Entity.FeverComponent.fever_able = false end --if(key == KeyboardKey.P) then --self:hitself() --end --if(key == KeyboardKey.O) then -- self:betray() --end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleHitEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local AttackCenter = event.AttackCenter local AttackerEntity = event.AttackerEntity local Damages = event.Damages local Extra = event.Extra local FeedbackAction = event.FeedbackAction local IsCritical = event.IsCritical local TotalDamage = event.TotalDamage -------------------------------------------------------- if(self.Entity.Common.HP > 0) then self.Entity.Common:canmove() self.casting = false end _TimerService:ClearTimer(self.timer)
self:casting_bar_remove()
